alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 1:28AM MST until February 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of snow and blowing snow. Snow totals of 1 to 3 inches will be common, with heavier amounts where narrow areas of snow persist. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...Until 5 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. The worst conditions will occur through around noon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy northerly wind combined with bursts of heavier snow will result in visibility under a quarter mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
